- Random variables
  - Upper case letters
  - For example, $X$, $Y$
- Realizations of random variables
  - Lower case letters
  - For example, $x$, $y$
- Matrix
  - Bold upper case letter
  - For example, $\mathbf{X}$
- Vector
  - Bold lower case letter
  - For example, $\mathbf{y}$
